text: Attended their performance, well organised and staff was so entertaining. Even gave out free gifts for us even though we happen to just watch from outside at first. Would definitely register my child when they are of age. Good environment!

My gal is interested in playing piano and we approached the centre here. The counter staff, Clara who is a pleasant , meticulous and very approachable staff. Glad to get the available timing that suits us. A very pleasant environment with library thatâ€™s next to it too.
Staff is very supportive. The location is convenient as the Frontier building connect to Jurong Point via sky bridge so no problem to go on the rainy day.

This music school offers a fantastic learning environment for students of all levels.  The instructors are patient, knowledgeable, and passionate about music education.  The curriculum is well-structured and covers a wide range of musical concepts and skills. I highly recommend this music school to anyone looking to enhance their musical journey.

Clara was very helpful and informative right from the start. She was very patient and gave very detailed explanation to clear my queries. Managed to enroll my 3 children into the programme that I wanted and had a smooth transaction throughout. I am very certain my children will have a good learning journey at Yamaha Music School at Frontier Community Centre.
